name: DhiWise - Figma to Code
description:
Figma to code conversion in minutes for iOS, Flutter, & Android.


How does it work? Too fast!


Install the plugin

Select the technology in which you need the code (iOS, Flutter, or Android(Kotlin))

Receive the downloadable source code in your Email


How does DhiWise convert Figma to code? 


DhiWise identifies the view components in your Figma design and converts them to code, which can be configured on the DhiWise platform to add more features to your mobile app. 


Once developers have the code they can go to DhiWise to further customize their mobile app or to add essential features. For example,, from changing component view type to set up multiple actions like navigation, API integration, & more.


Build production-ready mobile applications


Try DhiWise for free! Go to DhiWise and start building a responsive app with essential features, and generate the source code all within a few minutes!


Additional features & customization option on DhiWise. 


DhiWise is better than any no-code platform because it is a Pro Code platform made exclusively to empower developers and increase productivity


Change view - Change a view component type.


Create action - Create actions in minutes & map out your app flow.


(API integration, permission, alert box, navigation, back navigation, Firebase integration, sign out, & social authentication..)


Lifecycle - Set up actions for your screen with the life cycle method.


Developers are welcome to explore DhiWise full features to add to their apps.  


iOS (Swift) developers can expect


Features such as API integration, navigation, back navigation, & show alert.


Android (Kotlin) developers can expect


The features such as database, constant, API integration, product flavor, Firebase integration, & social authentication.


Flutter developers can expect


The features such as API integration, navigation, back navigation, & show alert.


Furthermore, read our essential guide articles for Figma designers to get optimal results from DhiWise for maximum code accuracy.
